prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a strong claw and a bright red shell.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a crab, showcasing its fierce claws and bright colors.
Generate a creature that embodies the essence of the sea with vibrant orange and white colors.
Make a Pokemon that is both fearsome and playful, with oversized claws and a robust body.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in coastal habitats, featuring a striking red and beige color scheme.
Design a Pokemon that is agile and strong, with distinctive claws and a unique aquatic appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that stands out with its fierce demeanor and vibrant coloration.
